email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We are seeking a vessel to transport 85,000MT of coal from Newcastle, Australia, to Shanghai, China, on CIF terms. The cargo is ready for loading by October 20th. Could you provide a freight quote and confirm vessel availability?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 95,000, LOA 230m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 28.50 per MT. Laycan is 20-25 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 28.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider a rate of USD 26.00 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

After reviewing your request, I can offer a revised rate of USD 26.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 96 hours. The laycan remains 20-25 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing Coal Shipment Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 26.50 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with booking the OCEAN HARMONY for the laycan of 20-25 October. Could you send over the charter party for review?

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for confirming. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Thank you for your assistance!

Best regards,
Liam
